tool.name: QuickMerge
tool.command:
## TODO: Fill in command template.
## TODO PARAMS: ## Nucmer ## l) Set the minimum length of a single match (default 20) ## ## delta-filter ## r) Maps each position of each reference to its best hit in the query, allowing for query overlaps ## q) Maps each position of each query to its best hit in the reference, allowing for reference overlaps ## l) Set the minimum alignment length, default 0 ## ## Quickmerge ## hco) ? (default 5.0) ## c) ? ## l) Seed length cutoff ## ml) Merging length cutoff
nucmer -l 100 -prefix out '$assembly_ref' '$assembly_query' && delta-filter -r -q -l 10000 out.delta > out.rq.delta && quickmerge -d out.rq.delta -q '$assembly_query' -r '$assembly_ref' -hco 5.0 -c 1.5 -l 2000 -ml 100 -p test
